error.title: Document could not be found
error.description: This document does not seem to exist

errors.noWorkbooksDescription: Data checklist requires at minimum 1 workbook to be active. Please have your developer check the configuration. If this problem persists please contact support.
errors.cannotLoadChecklist: Unable to load the data checklist

tooltips.noExtension: This file doesn't have an extension. Add the correct file extension to the file name and reupload the file to import it into a workbook
tooltips.cannotImport: Importing to a workbook is not currently available for this file

errors.uploadDisabledHeading: This space does not currently support file uploads.
errors.uploadDisabledDescription: If you think this is an error, please talk to support.

deleteModal.uploadsDescription_one: All data imported will be saved. This will delete the file from the space.
deleteModal.uploadsDescription_other: All data imported will be saved. This will delete the files from the space.
deleteModal.downloadDescription_one: This downloaded file will be deleted from the space.
deleteModal.downloadDescription_other: These downloaded files will be deleted from the space.

uploads.heading: Add files
uploads.description: Drag and drop or upload a file to get started

popovers.uploadsDisabled: This space does not currently support file uploads.

sheetSelection.title: Import to...
sheetSelection.importFromHeading: Select a sheet to load data from
sheetSelection.importToHeading: Select a sheet to import this data to

mapFields.title: Map fields
mapFields.subheading: Review and confirm each mapping choice

progressPill.tooltip: You've mapped {{mappedIncomingFields}} of {{totalIncomingFields}} fields in your dataset to the target sheet

tooltip.progress: {{mappedDestinationFields}} of the {{totalDestinationFields}} available fields in the target sheet have been mapped to

addNewField.label: Add as new field
addNewField.description: Add this field to your sheet

mapEnums.title: Map Fields
mapEnums.subheading: These fields have values that must be mapped to a list of valid options.

incomingFields.heading: Incoming Values
incomingFields.noDataTooltip: You can select a valid option to populate all empty cells. You can also leave this blank.

dropdownOptions.keepAsIsDisabledTooltip: Adding a new option to this list is not supported. Importing a value that is not a valid option will show as an error.

errors.refreshPageDescription: Refresh the page to try again. If the problem persists, contact support.

panel.empty: Jobs will appear here when they're running or completed

panel.heading: Version History
panel.empty: Versions, once generated, will appear here. Versions are generated automatically, often when a bulk transformation of data occurs.
panel.versionRestored: Version created before restore of a previous version
panel.generatedSnapshot: Snapshot generated before applying AI Transform for prompt:

default.description: An unexpected error occurred - no matching action applied

confirm.heading: Confirm Version Restore
confirm.description: You are about to restore your sheet data to a previous version - would you like to proceed?

success.heading: Version Restore Successful
success.description: Your Sheet has been successfully restored to an older version! Please inform any collaborators within the sheet to refresh their browser to reduce the risk of issues

confirm.heading: Delete Version
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete the selected version?

success.heading: Version Deleted
success.description: The selected version has been deleted.

error.heading: Unable to delete version
error.description: The selected version could not be deleted due to an unexpected error - if the problem persists, contact support

noSheets.title: Workbook contains no sheets
noSheets.message: A workbook must contain at least one sheet. None were found.

errors.cellUpdateFailed: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again. If this continues, please reach out to support

emptyView.heading: Let's get started
emptyView.uploadFile: Drag and drop or upload a file to get started

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.description: The table is having trouble displaying this data. Please see the console for error details.

copyAlert.heading: Would you like to download this file?
copyAlert.description: We noticed you're trying to select more than 100 records. We limit copying to 100 records in order to maintain the integrity of your data.
copyAlert.download: Would you like to download this sheet as a .csv?

pasteAlert.heading: You've hit our paste limit!
pasteAlert.descriptionStart: We noticed you're trying to paste data over more than 100 records. We limit pasting to 100 records in order to maintain the integrity of your data.
pasteAlert.descriptionEnd: The records you see inside Flatfile may not be in the exact same order as your source file -- Flatfile intelligently modifies your data to remove empty records, duplicates, etc. We don't recommend pasting more than 100 records at a time.

deleteAlert.heading: You've hit our delete limit!
deleteAlert.descriptionStart: We noticed you're trying to delete data over more than 100 records. We limit delete to 100 records at a time in order to maintain the integrity of your data.
deleteAlert.descriptionEnd: The records you see inside Flatfile may not be in the exact same order as your source file -- Flatfile intelligently modifies your data to remove empty records, duplicates, etc. We don't recommend pasting more than 100 records at a time.

tooltip.maxPinned: You can pin up to three columns, unpin one of the currently pinned columns in order to pin this column
tooltip.pin: Pin this column to the left of the table

heading.addValues: Add a value to empty cells in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToCount_one: Add a value to {{formattedCount}} empty cell in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToCount_other: Add a value to {{formattedCount}} empty cells in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToAll: Add a value to all empty cells in {{columnName}}

description.noEmptyValues: We couldn't find any empty cells in this field!
description.addValues: This will populate all empty cells in {{columnName}}
description.addValuesToCount_one: There is {{formattedCount}} empty cell in {{columnName}}, you can bulk populate this with a selected value
description.addValuesToCount_other: There are {{formattedCount}} empty cells in {{columnName}}, you can bulk populate these with a selected value
description.addValuesToAll: There are all empty cells in {{columnName}}, you can bulk populate these with a selected value

modal.heading: Find and replace in {{columnName}}
modal.descriptionPartialAndExact: Bulk replace any text in this column. We support both partial and exact matches for this data
modal.descriptionExactOnly: Bulk replace any text in this column with a valid value. We surface exact matches only
modal.isFiltered: This dataset has been filtered. Find and replace will only run on filtered records.
modal.searchForEmpty: If this field is left empty, we'll search for empty values

replaceEnum.moreOptions: Showing first 100 options. Search to see more.

replaceValue.leavingBlank: Leaving this field blank will delete selected values

errors.findError: There was an error finding values
errors.replaceError: There was an error replacing values
errors.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try again

tooltip.noData: There are no rows available to select. Only rows containing data can be selected.
tooltip.createRow: Add data to create this row

messages.reference: Value does not exist in the reference table

tooltip.filteredBySearch: This dataset has been filtered via search to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredBySearchAndError: This dataset has been filtered via search and the error filter to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredByError: This dataset has been filtered via the error filter to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredByFFQL: This dataset has been filtered via the Flatfile Query Language to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filtered: This dataset has been filtered to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.

disabled.deleteDisabled: Deleting records is disabled in this Sheet.
disabled.noRecordsSelected: Select at least one record in order to delete it

disabledTooltip.requireSelection: Please select one or more records to use this action
disabledTooltip.requireAllValid: This action requires all selected rows to be valid

getNewAccessLink.heading: Check your inbox
getNewAccessLink.content: We've sent a secure access link to
getNewAccessLink.finePrint: If you have trouble locating the email, check your spam folder or refresh this page to send another access link. The link will work for 5 minutes.

transform.description: ask AI to transform your data

errorBanner.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errorBanner.versionError: Unable to create a rollback version - AI transform aborted. Please try again.

transform.instruction: Describe how you'd like the AI assistant to transform your data:

review.description: Here's what I came up with. Read the step by step explanation and the query, and if it looks good, click below to apply it.
review.warning: Warning: This will transform your data

query.description: ask AI to write a query for you in FFQL

errorBanner.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

query.instruction: Describe how you'd like the AI assistant to query your data:

review.description: Here's what I came up with. Read the step by step explanation and the query, and if it looks good, click below to apply it.
